title: NERF JAX!
body: Riot WTF is WRONG WITH U GUYS ! NERF JAX NOT OTHER CHAMPS LIKE KARMA OR WHAT EVER  THIS GAME GIVE ME %%%%%% WITH THIS JAX!

replies.body:
Can you pls NERF this fcking retard hero ?? His ult is just to stupid for the world.
I had one game against him and it is fcking op how jax is now. 
So pls make this game fair.
So wunderbar rationale posts finde ich ganz prima. Die eignen sich f√ºr die Initiierung einer konstruktiven Diskussion. Mehr Poster sollten sich an Dir ein Beispiel nehmen!
Play Jax and you understand him.
